title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. LXIV, pt. 5600 - Public Access To Records
content:

State Regulations
§ 5600.1 - Purpose
§ 5600.2 - Applications for and the inspection and copying of records
§ 5600.3 - Current list of records available for inspection and copying

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. LXIV, pt. 5600

Statutory authority: Public Officers Law, §

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
